title: Hackers Use TikTok Videos to Distribute Vidar and StealC Malware via ClickFix Technique
description: The malware known as Latrodectus has become the latest to embrace the widely-used social engineering technique called ClickFix as a distribution vector. "The ClickFix technique is particularly risky because it allows the malware to execute in memory rather than being written to disk," Expel said in a report shared with The Hacker News.
